column1: # See the files in data/test/session/scenario/ as more examples.
# SHOW(): show the composing text and candidates.
# SHOW_OUTPUT(): show the Output protobuf w/o removed candidates.
# SHOW_ALL(): show the Output protobuf with removed candidates.
# SHOW_LOG(id): show the log of the candidate of the `id`.
# SHOW_LOG_BY_VALUE(value): show the log of the candidates of the `value`.
# SEND_KEYS(keys): send each character as key events ("aiu" sends 3 events).
# SEND_KEY(key): send a key event ("Shift" sends a modifier key event).
# SEND_KANA_KEYS(keys, kanas): send each character as Kana key events.
# SEND_KEY_WITH_OPTION(key, ...options): send a key event with options.
# TEST_SEND_KEY(key): send a test key event.
# TEST_SEND_KEY_WITH_OPTION(key, ...options): send a test key event with opts.
# SET_DEFAULT_REQUEST(): set the default request for desktop.
# SET_MOBILE_REQUEST(): set the default request for mobile.
# SET_REQUEST(key, value): set the request of `key` with `value`.
# SET_CONFIG(key, value): set the config of `key` with `value`.
# UPDATE_MOBILE_KEYBOARD(table, behavor): update the composing table.
